Topic.Title: How can I turn the volume into a double?

Posts.EditableText:
Reason being I want things like food to be 0.1g kinda like in Skyrim rather than have the Max Volume be super high like 1000 where fruit would be 1. 
However I have changed maxvolume, volume, and object volumes all into doubles and it still reads 0.1 as 0 rather than 0.  I can't find the library element that is causing it to round.
